title: I didn't quit, but I don't seem to be playing anymore
body:
Before Odyssey, I was playing several games a day between all my accounts. On October 6th, I decided that I had finished enough Odyssey missions (Ziggs skin shard and icon for all accounts, veteran emote on a couple), and I ran out of patience helping stragglers in Discord finish their missions. Since then, I've played a total of one game, on the 10th, because I noticed I hadn't played for a few days and was feeling a sense of obligation.

I'm not saying I quit the game, or I will quit, grr rage post, that sort of thing. I'm keeping LoL updated, and I sometimes consider playing. It's just that I realized that every time I considered loading up a match, I found myself thinking, "ugh, not that stuff again." I used to enjoy LoL.

I don't know why I'm making this post.

I think I am sad.

:(
